#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Wear Toms
#Text=Toms shoes are comfortable shoes made of canvas that are super popular in fashion and the media .
#Text=You ’ve probably seen your friends , family , or even celebrities wearing these classic-looking shoes .
#Text=If you want to create your own outfits with a pair of Toms shoes but you are n’t sure how , try dressing them up or down and creating looks that you feel comfortable and confident in .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Styling
#Text=Toms for Women
#Text=Wear Toms with dark wash jeans and a t-shirt for a classic look .
#Text=If you have a pair of brightly colored Toms or you want to look nice with minimal effort , style your Toms with a pair of dark wash jeans and a plain t-shirt .
#Text=Your Toms will be on display while integrating well with the rest of your outfit .
#Text=Match your t-shirt and the color of your Toms to make your outfit match .
#Text=Cuff your pant legs to show off your Toms .
#Text=No matter what type of pants you are wearing , cuff your pant legs above your Toms to show them off .
#Text=Roll up your pants 1 to 3 times until they are not touching your shoes .
#Text=Your pants should stay in place on their own .
#Text=Dress up your Toms with a skirt or dress .
#Text=This works best with sparkly or shiny Toms .
#Text=Wear a midi dress or skirt to accentuate your legs , and wear a nice pair of Toms to stay comfortable while looking formal .
#Text=Toms do not look great with tights , so try to wear them when it ’s warm enough that you do n’t need to cover up your legs .
#Text=Pair your Toms with shorts for a casual summer look .
#Text=Toms are great shoes to wear with shorts because they do n’t make your feet look big or clunky .
#Text=Wear dark wash jean shorts and a solid colored tank top with bright or patterned Toms .
#Text=Or , wear a patterned tank top or t-shirt with solid colored Toms .
#Text=If you wear your Toms in the sun , look out for the tan lines they will give you on the tops of your feet !
#Text=Styling Toms for Men
#Text=Cuff your pants above your ankles to draw attention to your Toms .
#Text=If you are going for a beachy look but it ’s not quite warm enough to wear shorts , cuff your pants or jeans above your ankles to attract attention to your shoes .
#Text=Try to make your cuff small so that it does n’t overtake this look .
#Text=If you are going for a sleek look , make sure that your cuff is the same length all the way around .
#Text=Wear slim-fitting shorts that stop above your knee for a beachy look .
#Text=Since Toms are form fitting to your foot , your shorts should mirror that style .
#Text=Make sure your shorts fit you well and are n’t too baggy .
#Text=Buy shorts that stop just above your knee to complete this look .
#Text=Pair them with slacks for a business casual look .

#Text=An outfit with Toms is probably too casual for the actual office , but if you want to achieve a business casual look in your daily life , wear a pair of dark , solid-colored Toms with a light pair of khaki pants .
#Text=Or , wear a light pair of Toms with a dark pair of khaki pants .
#Text=You can dress this look down with a simple t-shirt , or throw on a button-down to make it a little bit more classy .
#Text=Wearing Toms in Your Daily Life
#Text=Wear no-show socks with your Toms for extra warmth .
#Text=Toms are made of canvas so they are n’t very warm .
#Text=If it ’s cold outside , wear no-show socks with your Toms .
#Text=These are socks that fit over the heel and toes of your foot , but do n’t go up to your ankle or cover the top of your foot .
#Text=It will look like you are n't wearing any socks at all .
#Text=You can find no-show socks online or at most local retail stores .
#Text=Do n’t wear any socks if it ’s warm out .
#Text=If the weather is nice out or if your Toms are a crochet pattern with breathable holes , wear no socks at all .
#Text=They will slip on and off more easily this way .
#Text=Make sure to air out your Toms after wearing them without socks so that they do n’t start to smell .
#Text=Keep your Toms dry by wearing them when the weather is nice .
#Text=Toms are made of canvas , which means they are super comfortable .
#Text=Unfortunately , this also means they are not waterproof .
#Text=If you wear your Toms in the rain or snow , your feet will get wet .
#Text=Try to wear your Toms when the weather is good in your area .
#Text=Use Toms as comfortable traveling shoes .
#Text=When you are traveling , you just want to be comfortable .
#Text=Wearing Toms can sometimes feel like wearing no shoes at all .
#Text=If you are going to be traveling by plane or car for a long period of time , pair your Toms with your comfortable traveling outfit .
#Text=Toms do n’t make great walking shoes since they do n’t have much arch support .
#Text=If you will be traveling on foot , bring another pair of shoes to change into .
